title: Scout Think Stage Output Schema
description: Schema for the output of the ScoutAgent think stage, which analyzes Reddit data to identify pain points

per_thread_summaries.description: Summaries and pain points extracted from each analyzed Reddit thread

subreddit.description: Name of the subreddit where the thread was posted

permalink.description: Relative URL path to the Reddit thread

bullets.description: 2-3 concise bullet points summarizing the thread content

pains.description: Pain points identified in this specific thread

evidence.description: Citations supporting this pain point (comment IDs or direct quotes)

severity.description: Assessed severity of the pain point

tags.description: Categorization tags for the pain point

pains.description: Deduplicated pain points aggregated across all analyzed threads

statement.description: Normalized pain point statement (deduplicated across threads)

support_count.description: Number of occurrences or mentions of this pain point

citations.description: References to threads or comments where this pain was identified

tags.description: Categorization tags for the pain point

themes.description: Thematic clusters of related pain points

theme.description: Descriptive label for the theme cluster

count.description: Number of pain points in this theme

example_citations.description: Example references to threads or comments illustrating this theme

related_pains.description: Pain point statements that belong to this theme

total_threads_analyzed.description: Total number of Reddit threads analyzed

next_steps.description: Suggested next steps for the analysis
